DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the pharmacokinetic of papaverine after administration into the artery mammaria interna.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Pavaverine After Intraluminal Administration
DOC.criteria: CABG Administration of papaverine into mammaria interna Allergy against papaverine
DOC.keyword: Complications Due to Coronary Artery Bypass Graft
